content: japanese version is fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols for help using japanese charted patterns please visit the japanese knitting & crochet group 1 english version here 2 **japanese version available here 3 ** **tools/materials ** * japanese size 10/0 crochet hook 6 0mm 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/japanese-knitting-and-crochet 2 https //www gosyo co jp/english/pattern/ehtml/epdf/2002/842ear_mirtilloearmuffs pdf 3 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/842ear/
